name: Equipment Malfunction
text: Give to the James Rhodes player. You may flip to your alter-ego form. Choose: • Exhaust James Rhodes → remove Equipment Malfunction from the game. • Remove all ammo counters from your identity. If 2 or fewer ammo counters were removed this way, this card gains surge. Discard this obligation.

flavor: "You and Stark - you both have it coming!"
name: Living Laser
text: Quickstrike. [star] Living Laser's attacks gain piercing. (War Machine's nemesis minion.)

flavor: Living Laser is attacking a government office. The employees inside need help!
name: Deadly Light Show
text: Hinder 1[per_hero] When Defeated: Deal 1 damage to each identity.

name: Laser Strike
text:
When Revealed: Discard an upgrade you control. If you cannot, this card gains surge.
[star] Boost: If this resolves during an undefended attack, discard an upgrade you control.
